title: Can't redeem the medival twitch
body: The redeem button is not coming up

replies.body:
Hey Best Overall,

If you're having issues redeeming Medieval Twitch, please submit a ticket to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584) so we can take a look at your account and help you out.
because you got it for free! like is this a joke post? that skin is rewarded for refer a friend so you got it for free.
